returns._0: The key (hash of PCR measurements) for the added image

returns.keys: The keys (hashes of PCR measurements) for the added images

params.pcrs: The PCR values identifying the image

isTCBValid(uint8,uint64).details: Returns true for any TCB if minimumTCB is unset (defaults to 0)

returns._0: Whether the TCB level is sufficient

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.key: The key (hash of PCR measurements) to remove

params.keys: Array of keys (hashes of PCR measurements) to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addImage(uint8,((uint8,bytes32)[],string.notice: Adds an image to the allowlist

addImages(uint8,((uint8,bytes32)[],strin.notice: Adds multiple images to the allowlist

images(uint8,bytes32).notice: Gets the allowed status for an image key

isImageAllowed(uint8,(uint8,bytes32)[]).notice: Checks if an image is allowed

isTCBValid(uint8,uint64).notice: Checks if a TCB level meets the minimum requirement

minimumTCB(uint8).notice: Gets the minimum TCB level for a Platform type

removeImage(uint8,bytes32).notice: Removes an image from the allowlist

removeImages(uint8,bytes32[]).notice: Removes multiple images from the allowlist

setMinimumTCB(uint8,uint64).notice: Sets the minimum TCB level for a Platform type
